page.title: 18CASTLE HILL 2985 AD
page.content: I am standing on top of Castle Hill. The castle has been rebuilt and it is a big tourist attraction in this area.It is sunny today and lots of families are just landing at the Heli- -park in their Heli-cars.The children with their green, spiky hair are shouting with excitement.Some families are arriving on the National Roller Coaster Train and others are mooring their Hover-marans in the Marina.Over on Flamborough Head I can see the ruins of the old lighthouse alongside the Nuclear Power Station.Everything is robot-controlled now so as usual it seems to be running very smoothly. A party is going to look round the old school.Children don't go to school now of course.Ive never seen a real school before so I'll just switch on my jet pack and go for a look around. Cheerio.{WILL IT REALLY BE LIKE THIS?
